main event: A witness observed a satellite descending and slowing to appear stationary in the night sky.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 2 minutes.,The satellite's course was described as straight.,Lighting and behavior were consistent with an artificial satellite re-entering the atmosphere.,The object changed colors from green and silver to orange during the sighting.,The report concluded the sighting to be astronomical in nature.
witness description: a witness observing from the ground
